medical_history.chief_complaint: Incidental finding of a right perirenal mass during pregnancy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The mass was identified via obstetric ultrasound scan during the third pregnancy. An MRI performed at 30 weeksâ€™ gestation showed a complex retroperitoneal mass. Labor was induced at 38 weeks with a subsequent normal vaginal delivery. The patient remained normotensive and asymptomatic throughout the pregnancy.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of paraganglioma in previous pregnancies and an R46Q germline mutation in the SDHB gene.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of SDHB germline mutation; sister presented with similar condition in pregnancy.
